title: Anyone else having queue time issues since the new patch? (or how 3 minutes somehow becomes +90...)
body:
http://i.imgur.com/qtyHUBs.jpg

Sat in a queue for literally more than an hour and a half (see above screenshot). After another 10 minutes or so passed, I got up to use the restroom and missed the queue pop. :P

replies.body:
Hmm.. that is quite a *long* queue time. I can't imagine this can happen normally, so I suspect this is would be caused by a poor connection to the servers that would cause you to miss some queue pops. If you work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), we can confirm that this isn't caused by settings that are local to your network.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
Thanks for the tip! Might be a few days before I can log in again, but if I run into this problem again I'll definitely give that a shot. :)
